item.title: Zagat End of Free
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: WSJ.com - Zagat Starts Charging For Access to Its Reviews Sounds like they have 750,000 registered members and have 10,000 subscribers in the first week of charging (1.3% in a week is pretty darn good). Also good: you can still use the database to find restaurants and addresses, but to get access to reviews and price per meal, you've got to fork it over ;-)
